group_1.narration: Client: Chika Aoba@Request: Please attract the Neo-Magius' attention@                  for just one day.

group_1.textCenter: Once again... I am Chika Aoba.

group_1.textLeft: Nice to meet you, Chika.

group_1.textRight: Yes...
...This request is at my sole discretion.
Please don't tell the others of the Tokime Clan...

group_1.textLeft: I don't mind, but...
For now, can you explain the situation?

group_1.textRight: ...Of course.
...At the cargo port the other day...
We, the Tokime Clan, went head-to-head@with the Neo-Magius.
One of us was injured...

group_1.textLeft: I heard a [textYellow:Kimochi] Stone got taken away...

group_1.textRight: Yes...
We're very eager to get it back.
But we're not going to take action until@everyone's fully recovered.
It's just...

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: I'd like to bring some of the children of@the branch families back to the village,
where the Tokime Clan's head family is,@to explain what happened...
But Feathers from the Neo-Magius have@staked out the area around our base...
The Suitoku Temple...
If we're seen, we'll be followed, and we'll@have trouble returning to the village.

group_1.textLeft: So you want us to draw their attention...

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's correct...

group_1.textLeft: Well, it doesn't seem like your request is@directly related to the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones...
So we don't have a problem taking it, but...
Are you sure it's okay that you told us that@Suitoku Temple is your base?

group_1.textRight: Yes, Livia introduced me to you.
I can trust you to be neutral!

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha...
(It's kinda uncomfortable when people@believe that so outright...)

group_1.textRight: We getcha! Leave the rest to us!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's avoid direct combat and try to@draw them away.

group_1.textRight: Please do...!

group_1.textLeft: First, we'll try to find out what their situation is@and look for an opening.
We'll coordinate when the time is right.
In the meantime, Chika, please prepare for@your return to the village.

group_1.textRight: Understood!

group_1.textLeft: Now, let's see if there are any Magical Girls@around here.

group_1.textRight: I'm in!

group_1.textLeft: One...[chara:302701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302701:lipSynch_1]two...[chara:302701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302701:lipSynch_1]three...
...Hmm, I'd say four or five?

group_1.textRight: They're ALL Neo-Magius?!

group_1.textLeft: I don't know...
That might include girls from the Union or@the Tokime Clan.
With this many people, we should split up@and check them out.

group_1.textRight: Agreed...but we don't have much time.
What should we do to get the Neo-Magius'@attention...
Maybe we can pretend to be one of them,@or pretend to be the Tokime Clan?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... If we want to stay neutral, we can't@trick them and make them resent us...
...No, on second thought...

group_1.textRight: Did you come up with something?

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, I'm not too positive yet.
For now, let's just find one of the Neo-Magius@girls!
